Module roborally
Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the game itself. It saves all the different assets like decks, players etc. and the game is started from here.
Author:
janau

    • getPlayerFromID

      public Player getPlayerFromID​(int id)
      Gets a player based on their ID from the list of players saved in Game.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the wanted player.
      Returns:
      Unique player with the ID, null if no player with the ID exists.

    • handleCheat

      public void handleCheat​(java.lang.String message, User user)
      Handles cheat messages received from the chat
      Parameters:
      message - including the # and the cheat
      user - user who sent the cheat
